con:part.con:content: <definitions name="BillRS" targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/RS/Polaris/Bill/V1" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:rs="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/RS/Polaris/Bill/V1"> <types> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/RS/Polaris/Bill/V1" schemaLocation="BillRM.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="QueryStatusRequestMessage"> <part name="payload" element="rs:ESBMsg"/> </message> <message name="QueryStatusResponseMessage"> <part name="payload" element="rs:ESBMsg"/> </message> <portType name="BillRSPort"> <operation name="queryStatus"> <input message="rs:QueryStatusRequestMessage"/> <output message="rs:QueryStatusResponseMessage"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="BillRSPortBinding" type="rs:BillRSPort"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" style="document"/> <operation name="queryStatus"> <soap:operation soapAction="queryStatus"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> </binding> <service name="BillRS"> <port name="BillRSPort" binding="rs:BillRSPortBinding"> <soap:address location=""/> </port> </service> </definitions>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/RS/Polaris/Bill/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/RS/Polaris/Bill/V1" xmlns:com="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" xmlns:rcom="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/RS/Polaris/Common/V1" xmlns:eo="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Transactions/Bill/V1"> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" schemaLocation="../../../../EnterpriseObjects/Common/V1/CommonComponents.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Transactions/Bill/V1" schemaLocation="../../../../EnterpriseObjects/Transactions/Bill/V1/BillEO.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/RS/Polaris/Common/V1" schemaLocation="../../Common/V1/CommonComponents.xsd"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Referenced Elements =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:element name="Bill" type="BillType"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Bill =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="BillType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="com:BillIdentifier" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="eo:BillType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="rcom:Amount" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="eo:BillStatus" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= ESB Message =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="ESBMsgType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="rcom:ESBMsgType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="RqData" type="RqDataType"/> <xsd:element name="RsData" type="RsDataType"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ESBMsg" type="ESBMsgType"/> <xsd:complexType name="RqDataType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Bill" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RsDataType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Bill" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:Status" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns=" http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" xmlns:com="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="DataTypes.xsd"/> <xsd:simpleType name="LanguageCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ActionCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="Create"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Query"/> <xsd:enumeration value="QueryStatus"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Update"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Delete"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ResponseCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="Success"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Failure"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MsgTypeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="Requester"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Business"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Enterprise"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Provider"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ServiceType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ChequeES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ChequeBookES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="BillerES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PaymentES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TransferES"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns=" http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" xmlns:com="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1"> <xsd:complexType name="AmountType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="currencyCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="BinaryObjectType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:base64Binary"> <xsd:attribute name="mimeCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="characterSetCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="fileName" type="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="CodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DateType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:date"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DateTimeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:dateTime"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DurationType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:duration"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="IDType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="IndicatorType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:boolean"> <xsd:pattern value="false"/> <xsd:pattern value="true"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="IntegerType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="MeasureType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="NameType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NumericType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PercentType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="QuantityType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RateType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="baseValue" type="xsd:decimal" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="baseUnitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="TextType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="StringType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="URIType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:anyURI"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="YearType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:gYear"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="TimeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:time"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MonthType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"> <xsd:pattern value="01"/> <xsd:pattern value="02"/> <xsd:pattern value="03"/> <xsd:pattern value="04"/> <xsd:pattern value="05"/> <xsd:pattern value="06"/> <xsd:pattern value="07"/> <xsd:pattern value="08"/> <xsd:pattern value="09"/> <xsd:pattern value="10"/> <xsd:pattern value="11"/> <xsd:pattern value="12"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MonthDayType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:gMonthDay"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PositiveIntegerType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:positiveInteger"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NonNegativeIntegerType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:nonNegativeInteger"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" xmlns:com="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="CommonComponents.xsd"/> <xsd:complexType name="ESBMsgType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MsgID" type="com:IDType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Source" type="com:IDType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="MsgType" type="com:MsgTypeType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Service" type="com:ServiceType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="StatusType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Code" type="com:CodeType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Type" type="com:StringType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Text" type="com:TextType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Status" type="com:StatusType"/> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Transactions/Bill/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Transactions/Bill/V1" xmlns:com="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1"> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" schemaLocation="../../../Common/V1/CommonComponents.xsd"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Referenced Elements =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:element name="BillType" type="com:CodeType"/> <xsd:element name="BillStatus" type="com:CodeType"/> <xsd:element name="Bill" type="BillType"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Bill =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="BillType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="com:BillIdentifier" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="BillType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:Amount" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="BillStatus" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= ESB Message =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="ESBMsgType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="com:ESBMsgType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="RqData" type="RqDataType"/> <xsd:element name="RsData" type="RsDataType"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ESBMsg" type="ESBMsgType"/> <xsd:complexType name="RqDataType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Bill" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="actionCode" type="ActionCodeType" use="optional"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RsDataType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Bill" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:Status" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Action Codes =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:simpleType name="ActionCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="QueryStatus"/> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns=" http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" xmlns:com="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1"> <xsd:complexType name="AmountType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="currencyCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="BinaryObjectType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:base64Binary"> <xsd:attribute name="mimeCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="characterSetCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="fileName" type="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="CodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DateType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:date"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DateTimeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:dateTime"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DurationType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:duration"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="IDType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="IndicatorType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:boolean"> <xsd:pattern value="false"/> <xsd:pattern value="true"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="IntegerType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="MeasureType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="NameType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NumericType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PercentType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="QuantityType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RateType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="baseValue" type="xsd:decimal" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="baseUnitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="TextType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="StringType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="URIType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:anyURI"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="YearType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:gYear"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="TimeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:time"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MonthType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"> <xsd:pattern value="01"/> <xsd:pattern value="02"/> <xsd:pattern value="03"/> <xsd:pattern value="04"/> <xsd:pattern value="05"/> <xsd:pattern value="06"/> <xsd:pattern value="07"/> <xsd:pattern value="08"/> <xsd:pattern value="09"/> <xsd:pattern value="10"/> <xsd:pattern value="11"/> <xsd:pattern value="12"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MonthDayType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:gMonthDay"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PositiveIntegerType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:positiveInteger"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NonNegativeIntegerType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:nonNegativeInteger"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns=" http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" xmlns:com="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1"> <xsd:complexType name="AmountType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:simpleType name="IndicatorType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:boolean"> <xsd:pattern value="false"/> <xsd:pattern value="true"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="IntegerType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="MeasureType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="NameType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NumericType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PercentType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="QuantityType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RateType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="baseValue" type="xsd:decimal" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="baseUnitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="TextType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="StringType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="URIType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:anyURI"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="YearType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:gYear"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="TimeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:time"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MonthType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"> <xsd:pattern value="01"/> <xsd:pattern value="02"/> <xsd:pattern value="03"/> <xsd:pattern value="04"/> <xsd:pattern value="05"/> <xsd:pattern value="06"/> <xsd:pattern value="07"/> <xsd:pattern value="08"/> <xsd:pattern value="09"/> <xsd:pattern value="10"/> <xsd:pattern value="11"/> <xsd:pattern value="12"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MonthDayType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:gMonthDay"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PositiveIntegerType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:positiveInteger"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NonNegativeIntegerType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:nonNegativeInteger"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns=" http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" xmlns:com="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="DataTypes.xsd"/> <xsd:simpleType name="LanguageCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ActionCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="Create"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Query"/> <xsd:enumeration value="QueryStatus"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Update"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Delete"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ResponseCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="Success"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Failure"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MsgTypeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="Requester"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Business"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Enterprise"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Provider"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ServiceType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ChequeES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ChequeBookES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="BillerES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ProjectES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PaymentES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TransferES"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns=" http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" xmlns:com="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1"> <xsd:complexType name="AmountType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="currencyCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="BinaryObjectType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:base64Binary"> <xsd:attribute name="mimeCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="characterSetCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="fileName" type="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="CodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DateType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:date"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DateTimeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:dateTime"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DurationType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:duration"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="IDType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="IndicatorType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:boolean"> <xsd:pattern value="false"/> <xsd:pattern value="true"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="IntegerType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="MeasureType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="NameType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NumericType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PercentType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="QuantityType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RateType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="baseValue" type="xsd:decimal" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="baseUnitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="TextType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="StringType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="URIType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:anyURI"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="YearType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:gYear"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="TimeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:time"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MonthType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"> <xsd:pattern value="01"/> <xsd:pattern value="02"/> <xsd:pattern value="03"/> <xsd:pattern value="04"/> <xsd:pattern value="05"/> <xsd:pattern value="06"/> <xsd:pattern value="07"/> <xsd:pattern value="08"/> <xsd:pattern value="09"/> <xsd:pattern value="10"/> <xsd:pattern value="11"/> <xsd:pattern value="12"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MonthDayType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:gMonthDay"/> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns=" http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" xmlns:com="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1"> <xsd:complexType name="AmountType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:simpleType name="DurationType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:duration"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="IDType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="IndicatorType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:boolean"> <xsd:pattern value="false"/> <xsd:pattern value="true"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="IntegerType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="MeasureType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="NameType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NumericType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PercentType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="QuantityType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RateType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="baseValue" type="xsd:decimal" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="baseUnitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="TextType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="StringType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="URIType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:anyURI"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="YearType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:gYear"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="TimeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:time"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MonthType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"> <xsd:pattern value="01"/> <xsd:pattern value="02"/> <xsd:pattern value="03"/> <xsd:pattern value="04"/> <xsd:pattern value="05"/> <xsd:pattern value="06"/> <xsd:pattern value="07"/> <xsd:pattern value="08"/> <xsd:pattern value="09"/> <xsd:pattern value="10"/> <xsd:pattern value="11"/> <xsd:pattern value="12"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MonthDayType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:gMonthDay"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PositiveIntegerType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:positiveInteger"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NonNegativeIntegerType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:nonNegativeInteger"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

=============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="PaymentType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="com:PaymentIdentifier" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="PaymentType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:choice> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="com:BillIdentifier" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:BillAmount" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="com:CardIdentifier" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:choice> <xsd:element ref="com:Amount" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:ValueDate" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:TotalAmount" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:ChargeAmount" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:PersonName" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:Remarks" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:PayFromAccount" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:PayeeAccount" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="PaymentStatus" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="ESBMsgType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="com:ESBMsgType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="RqData" type="RqDataType"/> <xsd:element name="RsData" type="RsDataType"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ESBMsg" type="ESBMsgType"/> <xsd:complexType name="RqDataType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Payment" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="actionCode" type="ActionCodeType" use="optional"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RsDataType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Payment" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:Status" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence>
